trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number to its double-precision floating-point number equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 將數字的字串表示轉換為其相等的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number to its double-precision floating-point number equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 將數字的字串表示轉換為其相等的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to the numeric value or symbol specified in <paramref name="s" />.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數，與 <paramref name="s" /> 中指定的數值或符號相等。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can contain the current culture's <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveInfinitySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeInfinitySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NaNSymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or a string of the form:
trans-unit.target: `s`參數可以包含目前的文化特性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveInfinitySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeInfinitySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NaNSymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或格式的字串：

trans-unit.source: [*ws*][*sign*][*integral-digits*[*,*]]*integral-digits*[*.*[*fractional-digits*]][E[*sign*]*exponential-digits*][*ws*]
trans-unit.target: [*ws*][*sign*][*integral-digits*[*,*]]*integral-digits*[*.*[*fractional-digits*]][E[*sign*]*exponential-digits*][*ws*]

trans-unit.source: Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每個項目。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: A series of white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 一系列的空格字元。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *簽署*

trans-unit.source: A negative sign symbol (-) or a positive sign symbol (+).
trans-unit.target: 負號符號 （-） 或正號符號 （+）。

trans-unit.source: Only a leading sign can be used.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用前置正負號。

trans-unit.source: *integral-digits*
trans-unit.target: *integral-digits*

trans-unit.source: A series of digits ranging from 0 to 9 that specify the integral part of the number.
trans-unit.target: 一連串的數字，範圍從 0 到 9 的指定數目的整數部分。

trans-unit.source: Runs of *integral-digits* can be partitioned by a group-separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: 執行*整數位數*可以由群組分隔符號分割。

trans-unit.source: For example, in some cultures a comma (,) separates groups of thousands.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在某些文化特性逗號 （，） 分隔千分位群組。

trans-unit.source: The *integral-digits* element can be absent if the string contains the *fractional-digits* element.
trans-unit.target: *整數位數*項目可以是若字串包含*小數點後數字*項目。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific thousands separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的千分位分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific decimal point symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的小數點符號。

trans-unit.source: *fractional-digits*
trans-unit.target: *fractional-digits*

trans-unit.source: A series of digits ranging from 0 to 9 that specify the fractional part of the number.
trans-unit.target: 一系列的範圍從 0 到指定的數字的小數部分的 9 位數。

trans-unit.source: E
trans-unit.target: E

trans-unit.source: The "e" or "E" character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential (scientific) notation.
trans-unit.target: "E"或者"E"字元，表示此值會表示指數 （科學記號） 表示法。

trans-unit.source: *exponential-digits*
trans-unit.target: *exponential-digits*

trans-unit.source: A series of digits ranging from 0 to 9 that specify an exponent.
trans-unit.target: 一系列的範圍從 0 到 9 的指定指數的數字。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is interpreted using a combination of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Float?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands?displayProperty=nameWithType> flags.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數會使用的組合來解譯<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Float?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: This means that white space and thousands separators are allowed, for example, while currency symbols are not.
trans-unit.target: 這表示泛空白字元和千位分隔符號允許，比方說，而不是貨幣符號。

trans-unit.source: For finer control over which style elements are permitted in `s` for the parse operation to succeed, call the <xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> or the <xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 針對精細控制高於的樣式項目才允許`s`剖析作業成功，針對呼叫<xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is interpreted using the formatting information in a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that is initialized for the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數的使用中的格式設定資訊解譯<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>初始化為目前執行緒文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To parse a string using the formatting information of some other culture, call the <xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要剖析字串，使用其他文化特性格式資訊，請呼叫<xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, if you pass the <xref:System.Double.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method a string that is created by calling the <xref:System.Double.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, the original <xref:System.Double> value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，如果您要傳入<xref:System.Double.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法透過呼叫建立的字串<xref:System.Double.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法、 原始<xref:System.Double>會傳回值。

trans-unit.source: However, because of a loss of precision, the values may not be equal.
trans-unit.target: 不過，由於遺失有效位數，值可能不相等。

trans-unit.source: In addition, attempting to parse the string representation of either <xref:System.Double.MinValue> or <xref:System.Double.MaxValue> throws an <xref:System.OverflowException>, as the following example illustrates.
trans-unit.target: 此外，嘗試剖析任一個的字串表示<xref:System.Double.MinValue>或<xref:System.Double.MaxValue>會擲回<xref:System.OverflowException>，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: If a separator is encountered in the `s` parameter during a parse operation, and the applicable currency or number decimal and group separators are the same, the parse operation assumes that the separator is a decimal separator rather than a group separator.
trans-unit.target: 如果發現中分隔符號`s`期間剖析作業，以及適用的貨幣或十進位數的參數和群組分隔符號都相同，剖析作業會假設分隔符號是十進位的分隔符號，而不是群組分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: For more information about separators, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>, and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需分隔符號的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>，和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the <xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 在下列程式碼中，說明了如何使用 <xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%29> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> does not represent a number in a valid format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 並不代表有效格式的數字。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Double.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Double.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Double.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Double.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that indicate the style elements that can be present in <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，表示 <c>s</c> 中可以存在的樣式元素。

trans-unit.source: A typical value to specify is a combination of <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Float" /> combined with <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands" />.
trans-unit.target: 要指定的一般值為 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Float" /> 與 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands" /> 的組合。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified style to its double-precision floating-point number equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 將數字的字串表示 (使用指定樣式) 轉換為其相等的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to the numeric value or symbol specified in <paramref name="s" />.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數，與 <paramref name="s" /> 中指定的數值或符號相等。

trans-unit.source: The `style` parameter defines the style elements (such as white space, thousands separators, and currency symbols) that are allowed in the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed.
trans-unit.target: `style`參數定義的樣式項目 (例如泛空白字元，千位分隔符號和貨幣符號) 中允許`s`剖析作業成功的參數。

trans-unit.source: It must be a combination of bit flags from the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 它必須從位元旗標的組合<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members are not supported:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>不支援的成員：

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can contain the current culture's <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveInfinitySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeInfinitySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NaNSymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數可以包含目前的文化特性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveInfinitySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeInfinitySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NaNSymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of `style`, it can also take the form:
trans-unit.target: 值而定`style`，它也可採用的形式：

trans-unit.source: [*ws*][*$*][*sign*][*integral-digits*[*,*]]*integral-digits*[*.*[*fractional-digits*]][E[*sign*]*exponential-digits*][*ws*]
trans-unit.target: [*ws*][*$*][*sign*][*integral-digits*[*,*]]*integral-digits*[*.*[*fractional-digits*]][E[*sign*]*exponential-digits*][*ws*]

trans-unit.source: Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每個項目。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: A series of white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 一系列的空格字元。

trans-unit.source: White space can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, and it can appear at the end of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 空白字元可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，而且可以出現在結尾`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific currency symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的貨幣符號。

trans-unit.source: Its position in the string is defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 在字串中的位置由定義<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>目前文化特性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The current culture's currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 目前文化特性的貨幣符號可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *簽署*

trans-unit.source: A negative sign symbol (-) or a positive sign symbol (+).
trans-unit.target: 負號符號 （-） 或正號符號 （+）。

trans-unit.source: The sign can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, and it can appear at the end of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 符號可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，而且可以出現在結尾`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: Parentheses can be used in `s` to indicate a negative value if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowParentheses?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 括號可用於`s`來表示負數的值，如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowParentheses?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: *integral-digits*
trans-unit.target: *integral-digits*

trans-unit.source: A series of digits ranging from 0 to 9 that specify the integral part of the number.
trans-unit.target: 一連串的數字，範圍從 0 到 9 的指定數目的整數部分。

trans-unit.source: The *integral-digits* element can be absent if the string contains the *fractional-digits* element.
trans-unit.target: *整數位數*項目可以是若字串包含*小數點後數字*項目。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific group separator.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的群組分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: The current culture's group separator symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag
trans-unit.target: 目前的文化特性群組分隔符號可出現在`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific decimal point symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的小數點符號。

trans-unit.source: The current culture's decimal point symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 目前的文化特性小數點符號可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: *fractional-digits*
trans-unit.target: *fractional-digits*

trans-unit.source: A series of digits ranging from 0 to 9 that specify the fractional part of the number.
trans-unit.target: 一系列的範圍從 0 到指定的數字的小數部分的 9 位數。

trans-unit.source: Fractional digits can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 小數點後數字才會出現在`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: E
trans-unit.target: E

trans-unit.source: The "e" or "E" character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential (scientific) notation.
trans-unit.target: "E"或者"E"字元，表示此值會表示指數 （科學記號） 表示法。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can represent a number in exponential notation if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowExponent?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數可代表指數標記法之數字，如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowExponent?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: *exponential-digits*
trans-unit.target: *exponential-digits*

trans-unit.source: A series of digits ranging from 0 to 9 that specify an exponent.
trans-unit.target: 一系列的範圍從 0 到 9 的指定指數的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string with digits only (which corresponds to the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType> style) always parses successfully.
trans-unit.target: 只有數字的字串 (對應於<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>樣式) 一律會成功剖析。

trans-unit.source: The remaining <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType> members control elements that may be present, but are not required to be present, in the input string.
trans-unit.target: 其餘<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType>成員控制可能存在，但不一定要出現在輸入字串中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates how individual <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> flags affect the elements that may be present in `s`.
trans-unit.target: 下表指出如何個別<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>旗標會影響的項目可能會出現在`s`。

trans-unit.source: NumberStyles value
trans-unit.target: NumberStyles 值

trans-unit.source: Elements permitted in `s` in addition to digits
trans-unit.target: 在允許的項目`s`除了數字

trans-unit.source: The *integral-digits* element only.
trans-unit.target: *整數位數*只有項目。

trans-unit.source: The decimal point (*.*) and *fractional-digits* elements.
trans-unit.target: 小數點 (*。*) 和*小數點後數字*項目。

trans-unit.source: The "e" or "E" character, which indicates exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: "E"或者"E"字元，表示指數標記法中。

trans-unit.source: This flag by itself supports values in the form *digits*E*digits*; additional flags are needed to successfully parse strings with such elements as positive or negative signs and decimal point symbols.
trans-unit.target: 單獨使用這個旗標的形式支援值*位數*E*位數*; 其他旗標才能成功剖析項目像是正負號和小數點符號的字串。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the beginning of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*開頭的項目`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the end of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*結尾處的項目`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *sign* element at the beginning of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *登*開頭的項目`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *sign* element at the end of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *登*結尾處的項目`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *sign* element in the form of parentheses enclosing the numeric value.
trans-unit.target: *登*括住的數字值的形式的項目。

trans-unit.source: The thousands separator (,) element.
trans-unit.target: 千分位 （，） 分隔項目。

trans-unit.source: The currency ($) element.
trans-unit.target: 貨幣 （$） 項目。

trans-unit.source: All elements.
trans-unit.target: 所有項目。

trans-unit.source: However, `s` cannot represent a hexadecimal number or a number in exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: 不過，`s`無法表示的十六進位數字或指數標記法之數字。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the beginning or end of `s`, *sign* at the beginning of `s`, and the decimal point (.) symbol.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*開頭或結尾的項目`s`，*登*開頭`s`，和小數點 （.） 符號。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can also use exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數也可以使用指數標記法。

trans-unit.source: The `ws`, `sign`, thousands separator (,) and decimal point (.) elements.
trans-unit.target: `ws`， `sign`，千位分隔符號 （，） 和小數點 （.） 項目。

trans-unit.source: All elements.
trans-unit.target: 所有項目。

trans-unit.source: However, `s` cannot represent a hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: 不過，`s`無法表示的十六進位數字。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that is initialized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數會剖析使用的格式設定資訊中<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>初始化目前的系統文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, if you pass the <xref:System.Double.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method a string that is created by calling the <xref:System.Double.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, the original <xref:System.Double> value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，如果您要傳入<xref:System.Double.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法透過呼叫建立的字串<xref:System.Double.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法、 原始<xref:System.Double>會傳回值。

trans-unit.source: However, because of a loss of precision, the values may not be equal.
trans-unit.target: 不過，由於遺失有效位數，值可能不相等。

trans-unit.source: In addition, attempting to parse the string representation of either <xref:System.Double.MinValue> or <xref:System.Double.MaxValue> throws an <xref:System.OverflowException>, as the following example illustrates.
trans-unit.target: 此外，嘗試剖析任一個的字串表示<xref:System.Double.MinValue>或<xref:System.Double.MaxValue>會擲回<xref:System.OverflowException>，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: If a separator is encountered in the `s` parameter during a parse operation, and the applicable currency or number decimal and group separators are the same, the parse operation assumes that the separator is a decimal separator rather than a group separator.
trans-unit.target: 如果發現中分隔符號`s`期間剖析作業，以及適用的貨幣或十進位數的參數和群組分隔符號都相同，剖析作業會假設分隔符號是十進位的分隔符號，而不是群組分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: For more information about separators, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>, and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需分隔符號的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>，和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29> method to parse the string representations of <xref:System.Double> values using the en-US culture.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29>方法來剖析的字串表示<xref:System.Double>使用 EN-US 文化特性值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> does not represent a number in a valid format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 並不代表有效格式的數字。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Double.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Double.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Double.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Double.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="style" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberStyles" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="style" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberStyles" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="style" /> includes the <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="style" /> 包括 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information about <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供關於 <c>s</c> 的文化特性特定格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified culture-specific format to its double-precision floating-point number equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 將數字的字串表示 (使用指定的特定文化特性格式) 轉換為其相等的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to the numeric value or symbol specified in <paramref name="s" />.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數，與 <paramref name="s" /> 中指定的數值或符號相等。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the <xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method is typically used to convert text that can be formatted in a variety of ways to a <xref:System.Double> value.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載<xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法通常用來將各種不同的方式來格式化的文字轉換<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: For example, it can be used to convert the text that is entered by a user into an HTML text box to a numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它可以用來將由使用者在 HTML 文字方塊中輸入數值的文字轉換。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is interpreted using a combination of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Float?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands?displayProperty=nameWithType> flags.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數會使用的組合來解譯<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Float?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can contain <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveInfinitySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeInfinitySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NaNSymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the culture specified by `provider`, or it can contain a string of the form:
trans-unit.target: `s`參數可以包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveInfinitySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeInfinitySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NaNSymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>所指定的文化特性`provider`，或者也可以包含格式的字串：

trans-unit.source: [*ws*][*sign*]*integral-digits*[*.*[*fractional-digits*]][E[*sign*]*exponential-digits*][*ws*]
trans-unit.target: [*ws*][*sign*]*integral-digits*[*.*[*fractional-digits*]][E[*sign*]*exponential-digits*][*ws*]

trans-unit.source: Optional elements are framed in square brackets ([ and ]).
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的項目包覆以方括號 （[和]）。

trans-unit.source: Elements that contain the term "digits" consist of a series of numeric characters ranging from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 包含 「 數字"一詞的項目是由一系列的範圍從 0 到 9 的數字字元。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: A series of white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 一系列的空格字元。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *簽署*

trans-unit.source: A negative sign symbol (-) or a positive sign symbol (+).
trans-unit.target: 負號符號 （-） 或正號符號 （+）。

trans-unit.source: *integral-digits*
trans-unit.target: *integral-digits*

trans-unit.source: A series of digits ranging from 0 to 9 that specify the integral part of the number.
trans-unit.target: 一連串的數字，範圍從 0 到 9 的指定數目的整數部分。

trans-unit.source: Runs of *integral-digits* can be partitioned by a group-separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: 執行*整數位數*可以由群組分隔符號分割。

trans-unit.source: For example, in some cultures a comma (,) separates groups of thousands.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在某些文化特性逗號 （，） 分隔千分位群組。

trans-unit.source: The *integral-digits* element can be absent if the string contains the *fractional-digits* element.
trans-unit.target: *整數位數*項目可以是若字串包含*小數點後數字*項目。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific decimal point symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的小數點符號。

trans-unit.source: *fractional-digits*
trans-unit.target: *fractional-digits*

trans-unit.source: A series of digits ranging from 0 to 9 that specify the fractional part of the number.
trans-unit.target: 一系列的範圍從 0 到指定的數字的小數部分的 9 位數。

trans-unit.source: E
trans-unit.target: E

trans-unit.source: The "e" or "E" character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential (scientific) notation.
trans-unit.target: "E"或者"E"字元，表示此值會表示指數 （科學記號） 表示法。

trans-unit.source: *exponential-digits*
trans-unit.target: *exponential-digits*

trans-unit.source: A series of digits ranging from 0 to 9 that specify an exponent.
trans-unit.target: 一系列的範圍從 0 到 9 的指定指數的數字。

trans-unit.source: For more information about numeric formats, see the [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需數字格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)主題。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation whose <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that supplies culture-specific information used in interpreting the format of `s`.
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>實作其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件，提供特定文化特性資訊，用於解譯的格式`s`。

trans-unit.source: Typically, it is a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> or <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，這是<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>或<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null` or a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> cannot be obtained, the formatting information for the current system culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>無法取得的格式設定資訊會使用目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, if you pass the <xref:System.Double.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method a string that is created by calling the <xref:System.Double.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, the original <xref:System.Double> value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，如果您要傳入<xref:System.Double.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法透過呼叫建立的字串<xref:System.Double.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法、 原始<xref:System.Double>會傳回值。

trans-unit.source: However, because of a loss of precision, the values may not be equal.
trans-unit.target: 不過，由於遺失有效位數，值可能不相等。

trans-unit.source: In addition, attempting to parse the string representation of either <xref:System.Double.MinValue> or <xref:System.Double.MaxValue> throws an <xref:System.OverflowException>, as the following example illustrates.
trans-unit.target: 此外，嘗試剖析任一個的字串表示<xref:System.Double.MinValue>或<xref:System.Double.MaxValue>會擲回<xref:System.OverflowException>，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: If a separator is encountered in the `s` parameter during a parse operation, and the applicable currency or number decimal and group separators are the same, the parse operation assumes that the separator is a decimal separator rather than a group separator.
trans-unit.target: 如果發現中分隔符號`s`期間剖析作業，以及適用的貨幣或十進位數的參數和群組分隔符號都相同，剖析作業會假設分隔符號是十進位的分隔符號，而不是群組分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: For more information about separators, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>, and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需分隔符號的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>，和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example is the button click event handler of a Web form.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是按鈕 click 事件處理常式的 Web 表單。

trans-unit.source: It uses the array returned by the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.UserLanguages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine the user's locale.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用所傳回的陣列<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.UserLanguages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來判斷使用者的地區設定。

trans-unit.source: It then instantiates a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that corresponds to that locale.
trans-unit.target: 它接著會執行個體化<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>對應至該地區設定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that belongs to that <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object is then passed to the <xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method to convert the user's input to a <xref:System.Double> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>所屬的物件<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件隨後會傳遞至<xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法，將使用者轉換的輸入來<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> does not represent a number in a valid format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 並不代表有效格式的數字。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Double.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Double.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Double.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Double.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that indicate the style elements that can be present in <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，表示 <c>s</c> 中可以存在的樣式元素。

trans-unit.source: A typical value to specify is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Float" /> combined with <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands" />.
trans-unit.target: 要指定的一般值為 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Float" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands" /> 的組合。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information about <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供關於 <c>s</c> 的文化特性特定格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified style and culture-specific format to its double-precision floating-point number equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定樣式和特定文化特性格式，將數字的字串表示轉換為其相等的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to the numeric value or symbol specified in <paramref name="s" />.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數，與 <paramref name="s" /> 中指定的數值或符號相等。

trans-unit.source: The `style` parameter defines the style elements (such as white space, thousands separators, and currency symbols) that are allowed in the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed.
trans-unit.target: `style`參數定義的樣式項目 (例如泛空白字元，千位分隔符號和貨幣符號) 中允許`s`剖析作業成功的參數。

trans-unit.source: It must be a combination of bit flags from the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 它必須從位元旗標的組合<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members are not supported:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>不支援的成員：

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can contain <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveInfinitySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeInfinitySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NaNSymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the culture specified by `provider`.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數可以包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveInfinitySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeInfinitySymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NaNSymbol%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>所指定的文化特性`provider`。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of `style`, it can also take the form:
trans-unit.target: 值而定`style`，它也可採用的形式：

trans-unit.source: [*ws*] [*$*] [*sign*][*integral-digits*,]*integral-digits*[.[*fractional-digits*]][E[*sign*]*exponential-digits*][*ws*]
trans-unit.target: [*ws*] [*$*] [*sign*][*integral-digits*,]*integral-digits*[.[*fractional-digits*]][E[*sign*]*exponential-digits*][*ws*]

trans-unit.source: Elements framed in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 在方括號 （[和]） 是選擇性項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每個項目。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: A series of white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 一系列的空格字元。

trans-unit.source: White space can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, and it can appear at the end of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 空白字元可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，而且可以出現在結尾`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific currency symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的貨幣符號。

trans-unit.source: Its position in the string is defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 在字串中的位置由定義<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>目前文化特性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The current culture's currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 目前文化特性的貨幣符號可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *簽署*

trans-unit.source: A negative sign symbol (-) or a positive sign symbol (+).
trans-unit.target: 負號符號 （-） 或正號符號 （+）。

trans-unit.source: The sign can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, and it can appear at the end of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 符號可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，而且可以出現在結尾`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: Parentheses can be used in `s` to indicate a negative value if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowParentheses?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 括號可用於`s`來表示負數的值，如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowParentheses?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: *integral-digits*
trans-unit.target: *integral-digits*

trans-unit.source: A series of digits ranging from 0 to 9 that specify the integral part of the number.
trans-unit.target: 一連串的數字，範圍從 0 到 9 的指定數目的整數部分。

trans-unit.source: The *integral-digits* element can be absent if the string contains the *fractional-digits* element.
trans-unit.target: *整數位數*項目可以是若字串包含*小數點後數字*項目。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific group separator.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的群組分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: The current culture's group separator symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag
trans-unit.target: 目前的文化特性群組分隔符號可出現在`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific decimal point symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的小數點符號。

trans-unit.source: The current culture's decimal point symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 目前的文化特性小數點符號可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: *fractional-digits*
trans-unit.target: *fractional-digits*

trans-unit.source: A series of digits ranging from 0 to 9 that specify the fractional part of the number.
trans-unit.target: 一系列的範圍從 0 到指定的數字的小數部分的 9 位數。

trans-unit.source: Fractional digits can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 小數點後數字才會出現在`s`如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: E
trans-unit.target: E

trans-unit.source: The "e" or "E" character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential (scientific) notation.
trans-unit.target: "E"或者"E"字元，表示此值會表示指數 （科學記號） 表示法。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can represent a number in exponential notation if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowExponent?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數可代表指數標記法之數字，如果`style`包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowExponent?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: *exponential-digits*
trans-unit.target: *exponential-digits*

trans-unit.source: A series of digits ranging from 0 to 9 that specify an exponent.
trans-unit.target: 一系列的範圍從 0 到 9 的指定指數的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string with digits only (which corresponds to the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType> style) always parses successfully.
trans-unit.target: 只有數字的字串 (對應於<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>樣式) 一律會成功剖析。

trans-unit.source: The remaining <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType> members control elements that may be present, but are not required to be present, in the input string.
trans-unit.target: 其餘<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType>成員控制可能存在，但不一定要出現在輸入字串中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates how individual <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> flags affect the elements that may be present in `s`.
trans-unit.target: 下表指出如何個別<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>旗標會影響的項目可能會出現在`s`。

trans-unit.source: NumberStyles value
trans-unit.target: NumberStyles 值

trans-unit.source: Elements permitted in `s` in addition to digits
trans-unit.target: 在允許的項目`s`除了數字

trans-unit.source: The *integral-digits* element only.
trans-unit.target: *整數位數*只有項目。

trans-unit.source: The decimal point (*.*) and *fractional-digits* elements.
trans-unit.target: 小數點 (*。*) 和*小數點後數字*項目。

trans-unit.source: The "e" or "E" character, which indicates exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: "E"或者"E"字元，表示指數標記法中。

trans-unit.source: This flag by itself supports values in the form *digits*E*digits*; additional flags are needed to successfully parse strings with such elements as positive or negative signs and decimal point symbols.
trans-unit.target: 單獨使用這個旗標的形式支援值*位數*E*位數*; 其他旗標才能成功剖析項目像是正負號和小數點符號的字串。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the beginning of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*開頭的項目`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the end of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*結尾處的項目`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *sign* element at the beginning of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *登*開頭的項目`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *sign* element at the end of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *登*結尾處的項目`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *sign* element in the form of parentheses enclosing the numeric value.
trans-unit.target: *登*括住的數字值的形式的項目。

trans-unit.source: The thousands separator (,) element.
trans-unit.target: 千分位 （，） 分隔項目。

trans-unit.source: The currency ($) element.
trans-unit.target: 貨幣 （$） 項目。

trans-unit.source: All elements.
trans-unit.target: 所有項目。

trans-unit.source: However, `s` cannot represent a hexadecimal number or a number in exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: 不過，`s`無法表示的十六進位數字或指數標記法之數字。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the beginning or end of `s`, *sign* at the beginning of `s`, and the decimal point (.) symbol.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*開頭或結尾的項目`s`，*登*開頭`s`，和小數點 （.） 符號。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can also use exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數也可以使用指數標記法。

trans-unit.source: The `ws`, `sign`, thousands separator (,) and decimal point (.) elements.
trans-unit.target: `ws`， `sign`，千位分隔符號 （，） 和小數點 （.） 項目。

trans-unit.source: All elements.
trans-unit.target: 所有項目。

trans-unit.source: However, `s` cannot represent a hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: 不過，`s`無法表示的十六進位數字。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation whose <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that supplies culture-specific information used in interpreting the format of `s`.
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>實作其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件，提供特定文化特性資訊，用於解譯的格式`s`。

trans-unit.source: Typically, it is a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> or <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，這是<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>或<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null` or a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> cannot be obtained, the formatting information for the current system culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>無法取得的格式設定資訊會使用目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, if you pass the <xref:System.Double.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method a string that is created by calling the <xref:System.Double.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, the original <xref:System.Double> value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，如果您要傳入<xref:System.Double.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法透過呼叫建立的字串<xref:System.Double.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法、 原始<xref:System.Double>會傳回值。

trans-unit.source: However, because of a loss of precision, the values may not be equal.
trans-unit.target: 不過，由於遺失有效位數，值可能不相等。

trans-unit.source: In addition, attempting to parse the string representation of either <xref:System.Double.MinValue> or <xref:System.Double.MaxValue> throws an <xref:System.OverflowException>, as the following example illustrates.
trans-unit.target: 此外，嘗試剖析任一個的字串表示<xref:System.Double.MinValue>或<xref:System.Double.MaxValue>會擲回<xref:System.OverflowException>，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: If a separator is encountered in the `s` parameter during a parse operation, and the applicable currency or number decimal and group separators are the same, the parse operation assumes that the separator is a decimal separator rather than a group separator.
trans-unit.target: 如果發現中分隔符號`s`期間剖析作業，以及適用的貨幣或十進位數的參數和群組分隔符號都相同，剖析作業會假設分隔符號是十進位的分隔符號，而不是群組分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: For more information about separators, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>, and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需分隔符號的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>，和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The return value can be <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveInfinitySymbol%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeInfinitySymbol%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NaNSymbol%2A>, or a string of the form:
trans-unit.target: 傳回值可以是<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveInfinitySymbol%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeInfinitySymbol%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NaNSymbol%2A>，或格式的字串：

trans-unit.source: [sign]integral-digits[.[fractional-digits]][e[sign]exponential-digits]
trans-unit.target: [sign]integral-digits[.[fractional-digits]][e[sign]exponential-digits]

trans-unit.source: Optional elements are framed in square brackets ([ and ]).
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的項目包覆以方括號 （[和]）。

trans-unit.source: Elements that contain the term "digits" consist of a series of numeric characters ranging from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 包含 「 數字"一詞的項目是由一系列的範圍從 0 到 9 的數字字元。

trans-unit.target: 支援下表中列出的項目。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *簽署*

trans-unit.source: A negative sign or positive sign symbol.
trans-unit.target: 負號或正號。

trans-unit.source: *integral-digits*
trans-unit.target: *integral-digits*

trans-unit.source: A series of digits specifying the integral part of the number.
trans-unit.target: 指定數字的數字的整數部分。

trans-unit.source: Integral-digits can be absent if there are fractional-digits.
trans-unit.target: 整數數字，可不存在有小數點後數字。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific decimal point symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的小數點符號。

trans-unit.source: *fractional-digits*
trans-unit.target: *fractional-digits*

trans-unit.source: A series of digits specifying the fractional part of the number.
trans-unit.target: 指定數字的數字的小數部分。

trans-unit.source: A lowercase character 'e', indicating exponential (scientific) notation.
trans-unit.target: 小寫字元 'e'，表示指數 （科學記號）。

trans-unit.source: *exponential-digits*
trans-unit.target: *exponential-digits*

trans-unit.source: A series of digits specifying an exponent.
trans-unit.target: 指定數字的指數。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics:
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供廣泛的格式化支援，下列格式的主題中的更詳細地說明：

trans-unit.source: For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關數值格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation whose <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>實作其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: Typically, `provider` is a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object or a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，`provider`是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter supplies culture-specific information used in formatting.
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數提供特定文化特性的格式化使用的資訊。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the return value is formatted using the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object for the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`，傳回值的格式使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>目前的文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the string representation of two <xref:System.Double> values using <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> objects that represent several different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示兩個字串表示<xref:System.Double>使用值<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>代表數個不同的文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of <xref:System.Double.ToString%2A>, taking a <xref:System.String> and an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明使用<xref:System.Double.ToString%2A>，並且<xref:System.String>和<xref:System.IFormatProvider>做為參數。

trans-unit.source: A numeric format string.
trans-unit.target: 數值格式字串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the numeric value of this instance to its equivalent string representation, using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定格式，將這個執行個體的數值轉換成它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the value of this instance as specified by <paramref name="format" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體值的字串表示，如同 <paramref name="format" /> 所指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Double.ToString%28System.String%29> method formats a <xref:System.Double> value in a specified format by using the conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Double.ToString%28System.String%29>方法格式<xref:System.Double>使用目前文化特性的慣例來指定格式的值。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify a different format or culture, use the other overloads of the <xref:System.Double.ToString%2A> method, as follows:

trans-unit.target: 若要使用格式

trans-unit.source: For culture
trans-unit.target: 文化特性

trans-unit.target: 使用的多載

trans-unit.source: Default ("G") format
trans-unit.target: 預設值 ("G") 格式

trans-unit.source: Default (current) culture
trans-unit.target: 預設值 （目前） 的文化特性

trans-unit.source: Default ("G") format
trans-unit.target: 預設值 ("G") 格式

trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性

trans-unit.target: 特定的格式或有效位數

trans-unit.source: A specific culture
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性

trans-unit.source: The return value can be <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveInfinitySymbol%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeInfinitySymbol%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NaNSymbol%2A>, or the string representation of a number, as specified by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值可以是<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveInfinitySymbol%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeInfinitySymbol%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NaNSymbol%2A>，數字，所指定的字串表示法`format`。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter can be any valid standard numeric format specifier except for D and X, as well as any combination of custom numeric format specifiers.
trans-unit.target: `format`參數可以是任何有效的標準數值格式規範，除了 D 和 X，以及自訂數值格式規範的任何組合。

trans-unit.source: If `format` is `null` or an empty string, the return value is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G").
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`是`null`或空字串，傳回值會格式化為具有一般數值格式規範 ("G")。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics:
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供廣泛的格式化支援，下列格式的主題中的更詳細地說明：

trans-unit.source: For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關數值格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: By default, the return value only contains 15 digits of precision although a maximum of 17 digits is maintained internally.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，傳回的值只包含 15 個位數的有效位數雖然內部維護最多 17 個位數。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this instance has greater than 15 digits, <xref:System.Double.ToString%2A> returns <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveInfinitySymbol%2A> or <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeInfinitySymbol%2A> instead of the expected number.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行個體的值必須大於 15 位數，<xref:System.Double.ToString%2A>傳回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveInfinitySymbol%2A>或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeInfinitySymbol%2A>而不是預期的數目。

trans-unit.source: If you require more precision, specify `format` with the "G17" format specification, which always returns 17 digits of precision, or "R", which returns 15 digits if the number can be represented with that precision or 17 digits if the number can only be represented with maximum precision.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要更多有效位數時，指定`format`"G17"格式規格，它一定會傳回 17 個位數的精確度或"R"，它會傳回 15 位數數目可以使用 17 位數來表示，如果數字只能如果表示最大有效位數。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a numeric value and formats it as a currency value by using the "C" standard numeric format string and as a numeric value to three decimal places by using the "N" standard numeric format string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例定義的數值，並將其格式化為貨幣值使用"C"標準數值格式字串和三個小數位數以數值形式使用"N"標準數值格式字串。

trans-unit.source: The result strings are formatted by using the conventions of the en-US culture.
trans-unit.target: 結果字串會使用 EN-US 文化特性的慣例來格式化。

trans-unit.source: For more information on numeric format strings, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關數值格式字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays several <xref:System.Double> values using the supported standard numeric format specifiers together with three custom numeric format strings.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示數個<xref:System.Double>使用支援標準數值格式規範，以及三個自訂數值格式字串值。

trans-unit.source: One of those custom format strings illustrates how to pad a <xref:System.Single> value with leading zeros.
trans-unit.target: 這些自訂格式字串的其中一個說明如何填補<xref:System.Single>加上前置零的值。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the example uses precision specifiers with each standard format specifier except for "R".
trans-unit.target: 此外，此範例會使用精確度規範，使用"R"除了每個標準格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The values of the precision specifiers range from 0 to 3.
trans-unit.target: 有效位數規範範圍從 0 到 3 的值。

trans-unit.source: To convert the numeric values to strings, the example uses the formatting conventions of the en-US culture.
trans-unit.target: 若要將數字的值轉換成字串，此範例會使用 EN-US 文化特性的格式設定慣例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="format" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="format" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, <see cref="T:System.Double" /> values formatted with the "R" standard numeric format string do not successfully round-trip if compiled using the <see langword="/platform:x64" /> or <see langword="/platform:anycpu" /> switches and run on 64-bit systems.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，使用 "R" 標準數值格式字串格式化的 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 值，如果使用 <see langword="/platform:x64" /> 或 <see langword="/platform:anycpu" /> 參數編譯並在 64 位元系統上執行，則不會成功地反覆存取。

trans-unit.source: To work around this problem, you can format <see cref="T:System.Double" /> values by using the "G17" standard numeric format string.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決這個問題，您可以使用 "G17" 標準數值格式字串來格式化 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the "R" format string with a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value that does not round-trip successfully, and also uses the "G17" format string to successfully round-trip the original value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用 "R" 格式字串，搭配不會成功反覆存取的 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 值，並且也會使用 "G17" 格式字串來成功反覆存取原始值。
